com.neopixl.library.neorequest

Class NeoRequestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neopixl.library.neorequest.NeoRequestManager

  • public final class NeoRequestManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class used to store the object mapper ObjectMapper and the default retry policy RetryPolicy used by all requests. It acts as a singleton.

    Created by Florian ALONSO on 12/30/16. For Neopixl

    • Method Detail

      • setRequestTimeout

        public static void setRequestTimeout(int timeout,
                                     boolean regenerateRetryPolicy)
        Sets the timeout
        Parameters:
        timeout - default timeout for all requests
        regenerateRetryPolicy - if set to true, it will generate a new retry policy (30 seconds for the timeout, 1 retry maximum, 1 backoff multiplier)

      • setDefaultRetryPolicy

        public static void setDefaultRetryPolicy(RetryPolicy newRetryPolicy)
        Store a retry policy
        Parameters:
        newRetryPolicy - RetryPolicy

      • getDefaultRetryPolicy

        public static RetryPolicy getDefaultRetryPolicy()
        Get the default retry policy
        Returns:
        the default retry policy RetryPolicy

      • getObjectMapper

        public static ObjectMapper getObjectMapper()
        Get the default object mapper (with SerializationFeature.INDENT_OUTPUT set to false and SerializationInclusion set to JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)
        Returns:
        the current object mapper ObjectMapper

      • parseGetUrl

        public static java.lang.String parseGetUrl(int method,
                                           java.lang.String url,
                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                                           java.lang.String encoding)
        Converts a base URL, endpoint, and parameters into a full URL
        Parameters:
        method - The com.android.volley.Request.Method of the URL
        url - The URL
        params - The parameters to be appended to the URL if a GET method is used
        encoding - The encoding used to parse parameters set in the url (GET method)
        Returns:
        The full URL
